message: But when I step through, I find myself at Dry Juice's base.
Why? I should still be inside the shop.
The man who was watching me earlier is standing at the end of the alley, beneath the Dry Juice tag. His head is hung low.
I don't know what's going on, but somehow... I know who he is.
Suddenly, the scene shifts. Now the tag is covered in black, and the alley is splattered with blood.

name: ミズキ
message: "I love Rib. It's the most fun I've ever had. ...But that's why I have to think about the future."

name: ミズキ
message: "What do I have to do to make sure everyone's having fun? How do I make sure no one feels left out? It's always on my mind."

name: ミズキ
message: "I always thought it'd be enough to treat my guys like family."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I know how much you care about them. That's how Dry Juice became the biggest gang."
Mizuki looks down, balling his hands into fists.

name: ミズキ
message: "Rhyme's too popular. The hot new thing. Everyone's caught up in the craze. They're getting bored of Rib... abandoning it."

name: ミズキ
message: "Rib and Rhyme are just games. I know. People want their games to be fresh and cool. But I..."

name: ミズキ
message: "I didn't want to let it go. Rib... Dry Juice... they're too important to me."

name: ミズキ
message: "I know it's stupid to take a game so seriously, but I couldn't just let it go."

name: ミズキ
message: "Even my guys were slowly moving to Rhyme, and we weren't getting as many new recruits. Everything I worked so hard to build... was crumbling away..."
I grit my teeth. It's hard to see Mizuki like this.
I always knew Dry Juice meant a lot to him, but I never really knew just how deeply he cared.
Has he always been hurting like this inside? Why did I never notice?

name: ミズキ
message: "I spent every day worrying, thinking, but I couldn't figure out what to do... Then this guy showed up saying he was with Morphine."

name: ミズキ
message: "He said Dry Juice was the strongest Rib gang, and invited us to join them."

name: ミズキ
message: "At first, I thought he was shady as hell, but then he introduced me to other members of Morphine... and I started to think, maybe it wasn't such a bad idea."

name: ミズキ
message: "Maybe, if they could become members of the Morphine, everyone would stop talking about Rhyme."

name: ミズキ
message: "They could be proud of Dry Juice again."

name: ミズキ
message: "Yeah. But I was wrong! Morphine wasn't the kind of gang I thought it was. Morphine, they..."

name: ドライジュースメンバーＡ
ドライジュースメンバーＢ
ミズキ
message: "You said Dry Juice would be part of Morphine! Wasn't that the deal?! Why..."

name: ミズキ
message: "It wasn't supposed to be like this... It wasn't..."
He falls to his knees, hunched over, clutching his chest in pain.
His head snaps back with dangerous speed. His eyes dart frantically about, and more screams pour from his throat. Sweat rolls off him in waves.
I run up and grab him by the shoulders.
My head is pounding. What did I just see?
